data.title: Center for Fraternity & Sorority Development
data.meta_description: The University of Connecticut Greek Community is comprised of several social fraternities and sororities. The organizations included on this page are curren ...
data.text:
The University of Connecticut Greek Community is comprised of several social fraternities and sororities. The organizations included on this page are currently recognized by the Center for Fraternity and Sorority Development and are authorized to conduct activities, recruit students for membership, and utilize university resources and services. Please visit review the Statement on Unrecognized Groups for a list ofÂ other groups that may continue to exist within the community but are not connected with the university and operate unsanctioned.

The University of Connecticut actively supports the growth-enhancing opportunity for student self-governance. Â Primary authority for the self-governance of fraternities and sororities rests with the four governing Greek councils:

College Panhellenic Council (CPH)

The College Panhellenic Council is the governing council for the national engineering sorority and the general sororities/women's fraternities that hold membership in the National Panhellenic Conference (NPC).

Organization Chapter President Alpha Chi Omega Ally Brown Alpha Epsilon Phi Izzy Letourneau Alpha Omicron Pi Kylee Ficks Alpha Phi Charlotte Williamson Delta Zeta Kiley Keough Gamma Phi Beta Tori McNelis Kappa Alpha Theta Paige Dwyer Phi Sigma Rho Lucy Temple Pi Beta Phi

Jocelyn Rossignol

Intercultural Greek Council (IGC)

IGCÂ is the governing council for theÂ culturally-based fraternities and sororities. Though IGC member organizations have a focus onÂ cultural awareness, none are culturally exclusive.

Organization Chapter President Delta Phi Lambda Sorority, Inc. Anna Tran Delta Phi Omega Sorority, Inc. Daniya Chopra Kappa Phi Gamma Sorority, Inc. Raga Nimmigadda Kappa Phi Lambda Sorority, Inc. Melissa Tian Latino America Unida, Lambda Alpha Upsilon Fraternity, Inc. Derek Sanchez Lambda Phi Epsilon Fraternity, Inc. Ivan Chen Lambda Theta Alpha Latin Sorority, Inc. Danaeis Negron Lambda Theta Phi Latin Fraternity, Inc. Alejandro Soriano La Unidad Latina, Lambda Upsilon Lambda Fraternity, Inc. Rodney Delgado Mu Sigma Upsilon Sorority, Inc. Kemberlyn Martinez Pi Delta Psi Fraternity, Inc. Josh Lanzuela Sigma Lambda Upsilon/SeÃ±oritas Latinas Unidas Sorority, Inc. Arianna Nieves

Interfraternity Council (IFC)

IFC is the governing council for the men's general fraternities. Many of the fraternities have or have held membership in the North-American Interfraternity Conference.

Organization Chapter President Alpha Delta Phi Sam Askew Alpha Epsilon Pi Joshua Fishman Alpha Kappa Lambda Carson Hamilton Alpha Sigma Phi Nicholas Murphy Beta Theta Pi Joe Granata Delta Tau Delta Nathan Harasimowitz Phi Delta Theta Andrew Khan Pi Kappa Alpha Expansion planned for Fall 2025 Sigma Alpha Epsilon Suhaas Nadella Sigma Alpha Mu Sloan Gubner Sigma Chi Brad Krutz Sigma Phi Epsilon Justin Schneider Tau Kappa Epsilon CJ Ryan Zeta Psi Joseph Brewer

National Pan-Hellenic Council (NPHC)

NPHC is a collaborative organization of nine historically African American, international Greek-lettered fraternities and sororities, collectively referred to as the "Divine Nine."

Organization Chapter President Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Inc. Kennedy Evans Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity, Inc. Isaiah Williams Delta Sigma Theta Sorority, Inc. Expansion planned for Fall 2024 Iota Phi Theta Fraternity, Inc. Active Expansion Phi Beta Sigma Fraternity, Inc. Nas Lewin Sigma Gamma Rho Sorority, Inc. Kathrina Exantus Zeta Phi Beta Sorority, Inc. Lizamishel Boateng
